creator: sumanta_roy2003@yahoo.co.in
text:
I am using JfreeChart 1.0.4 and batik 1.6. When i save the pie chart into svg
then  the svg image not showing properly. If one of the value is geter than 54%
then it not showing properly. The svg file is following.

creator: cam@apache.org
text:
If determine if Batik is generating the paths for the pie segments incorrectly,
I'll need to see your program that uses JFreeChart to generate the SVG.  Can you
attach it to this bug?

creator: chris995@live.fr
text: Here is a svg file which can be used to get the problem : http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/2/27/Jack_of_diamonds_fr.svg
